clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Assessment of New Treatment Regimen for Adult Fulminant Myocarditis
clinical_study.official_title: Assesment of Clinical Therapeutic Efficacy of "Life-support Based Comprehensive Treatment Regimen" for Adult Fulminant Myocarditis

brief_summary.textblock: This is a retrospective cohort study to assess the clinical outcome of patients with fulminant myocarditis using "Life-support Based Comprehensive Treatment Regimen" and conventional therapy. In the present study, participants receive various treatment as part of routine medical care without any assignment of specific interventions to them. The process of treatment during hospitalization were recorded in medical chart and was reviewed by independent research personnel.

primary_outcome.time_frame: through hospital discharge, an average of 10 days
primary_outcome.description: The occurrence of death or cardiac transplantation was determined through direct contact with the patient or the family of the patient or review of the patient's medical record.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Life-support Based Comprehensive Treatment Regimen group

study_pop.textblock: 150 hospitalized patients with fulminant myocarditis will be enrolled in this study.
